title: dogmcoin
author: dogmcoin
created_time: May 29, 2022, 06:40:52 AMLast edit: September 13, 2024, 03:11:18 AM by dogmcoin
content: About DogmcoinDogmcoin is a fork coin of Dogecoin,Start at block height 4253400.This will be a fork of the Dogecoin blockchain, 1:1, no-premining, no-ico (it is like a full airdrop)Any Dogecoin address can be restored in the Dogmcoin wallet1 DOGE=1 DOGM  (At block height 4253399)134,706,495,485 DOGM in all DOGE users’ wallet addresses  (A total of more than 4 million addresses)If you have 1 million DOGE, then you have 1 million DOGM. Important information:Dogmcoin new consensus has been successfully activated.Dogmcoin and Dogecoin can Merged Mining at the same time!!!But Dynamic Auxpow chain ID changes every yearEnsure that no mining pool can monopolize forever, Prevent the permanent monopoly of the litecoin mining pool with the largest computing power.Countless people have verified it for a long timeDogmcoin does not cause Dogecoin replayDogmcoin blockchain is fully stablehttps://miningpoolstats.stream/dogmcoinBitcointalk:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5400580.0Dogmcoin Core wallet and code:(completed)https://github.com/dogmcoin/dogmcoinDogmcoin android wallet:(In development)https://github.com/msy2008/dogmcoin-wallet-new/releasesDogmcoin java library:(In development)https://github.com/dogmcoin/libdohjDogmcoin Explorer:(completed)https://chainz.cryptoid.info/dogm/Website: (In development)https://dogmcoin.com/Reddit:https://www.reddit.com/r/dogmcoin/Twitter:https://twitter.com/dogmcoinDiscord:https://discord.gg/bYsZGSVf6eTelegram:https://t.me/DogmcoinEnglishAbout Replay Protection!Theoretically, the replay problem is caused by the mixed connection of nodes.If the nodes are mixed, the chain transfer of either party is equivalent to broadcasting on two chains at the same time.Although this problem is theoretically solved, it cannot be completely ruled out, which requires more people and more time to verify.Developers don't have a lot of Dogecoin, so naturally they won't get a lot of Dogmcoin.Development takes a lot of time and money.Hope to get your donation:Dogecoin （DOGE）:DJUXhRCcv4KE8e5kkpyjbnsVKw5m3Fcr8MDogmcoin（DOGM）:DEx3nt7TLaF9AFZ3S9fuLTYaa8hmabC6PbIf your DOGE coins are on the exchange, please withdraw money to your own wallet before the block height is 4253400, the wallet where you can master the private key.Your private keys are precious.,Keep them safe.Only Core wallet is recommended:Dogecoin Core wallet and code：(DOGE）https://github.com/dogecoin/dogecoin/releasesDogmcoin Core wallet and code：(DOGM)https://github.com/dogmcoin/dogmcoin/releasesyiimp:https://github.com/msy2008/yiimp_install_scryptp2pool:https://github.com/msy2008/p2pool-nMiningpoolstats:https://miningpoolstats.stream/dogmcoin

comments.author: dogmcoin
comments.created_time: May 29, 2022, 07:00:18 AMLast edit: June 24, 2022, 03:19:03 AM by dogmcoin
comments.body: FAQWhat is Dogmcoin?Dogmcoin is a decentralised cryptocurrency based on the dogecoin.Dogmcoin is a forked coin based on dogecoin, and the height of the forked block is 4253400.forked coin based on dogecoin?This means that if you have 1 million Dogecoin, then you have 1 million Dogmcoin,Before block height 4253400.1DOGE=1DOGMAbout Replay Protection？Theoretically, the replay problem is caused by the mixed connection of nodes.If the nodes are mixed, the chain transfer of either party is equivalent to broadcasting on two chains at the same time.The source code of Dogmcoin has implemented anti-replay,it cannot be completely ruled out, which requires more people and more time to verify.What do you mean by "decentralised"?Dogmcoin is not run by any individual company or person. Technically speaking, it operates according to rules agreed by consensus, rather than decided upon by some founding or owning entity.What do you mean by "cryptocurrency"?A cryptocurrency is a digital currency that is secured by cryptography, in contrast to conventional (fiat) currencies where they are secured by a government or governments.Okay, but what does that mean?It means you don't have to trust any central organisation or person the way you would a bank, but also that you have to be your own bank. The developers can't seize your funds, but they also can't return them if you send them to the wrong address.So who does run Dogmcoin?No-one, or everyone does equally, depending how you look at it. The developers can release new software, but the community have to choose to use that software. That community includes not just the end-users, but miners, exchanges, payment processors, etc. Typically the community does adopt new software we release because we have an established track record, but there's no special access we have.I sent my Dogmcoin to the wrong address, or I sent Dogmcoin to a correct address, expecting goods or a payment in return, and have not received anything back - can you help in either case?Sadly, no in both cases. As noted above, Dogmcoin is a decentralized project and the developers working on the project have no special access or ability to reverse transactions or recover funds. If you feel you have been mislead or wronged in a transaction involving Dogmcoin, you should consult the relevant authorities in respect of the parties, exchanges, wallets or other services you dealt with.Can you reset my two factor authentication?We do not run any of the services which you log into, you would need to contact the service in question.I lost my wallet/private key, what do I do now?In many cases we discover people have backups they've forgotten about, checking old systems or thumb drives for copies is a good idea. If the keys are entirely lost, however, there is no way to recover them. Please back up your keys regularly.How do I use/accept Dogmcoin?We do not have the resources to verify service providers, so avoid making recommendations ourselves.Would you like to hear my business idea?We are an open source project, not a business - so no, thank you.Would you like paid advertising?We are an open source project, not a business - so no, thank you.Who do I talk to about listing Dogmcoin?You do not need our permission to list Dogmcoin. If you require business details for licensing, please note we are not a business and have no registered legal entity or address. If this is a challenge, consider who you would talk to about listing Bitcoin.I sent coins to the giveaway, why hasn't anything come back?Sadly these are people impersonating the Dogmcoin founders, developers, or similar. No-one needs you to send them coins in order for them to send you coins back. There's a good article on this on the BBC news website at https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-56402378.Why has my trade not gone through?The developers are not running an exchange, nor do we license exchanges, you would need to talk to the exchange in question.How do I back up my wallet?You need to back up the file "wallet.dat", you can find this in the data directory. On Windows by default this is "%APPDATA%\Dogmcoin", on OS X "~/Library/Application Support/Dogmcoin/", and on Linux it is "~/.Dogmcoin/".
